always cold except in the hands of liars
casts a faint shadow even in darkness
its reflection is delayed by a heartbeat
smells of wet stone after you make a promise
sings in harmonic intervals with nearby heartbeats
leaves frost on paper it touches
cannot be fully sheathed or covered
tastes like pennies if you speak its name
drips ink when the moon is new
rusts anything mundane that lies beside it overnight
makes dogs whine and statues smile
causes written words nearby to rearrange slightly
